sections.heading: The Magic of the Eiffel Tower
paragraphs: The Eiffel Tower is the shining symbol of Paris, attracting millions of visitors every year. From romantic sunsets to glittering night views, it offers an unforgettable experience.
Whether you're enjoying the tower from below or climbing to the summit, it’s a must-see for every traveler.

sections.heading: Best Things to Do
list: Climb to the second floor or summit
Enjoy a meal at the Eiffel Tower restaurants
Watch the tower sparkle at night

sections.heading: Travel Tips
paragraphs: Visit early morning or late evening to avoid heavy crowds. Bring a jacket as the summit can get windy.

sections.heading: Nearby Attractions
paragraphs: Explore the Seine River, Champ de Mars gardens, and the Musée du Quai Branly nearby.
